newsitem.title: CANADA: CAODC weekly western Canadian rig count - April 8.
newsitem.headline: CAODC weekly western Canadian rig count - April 8.

text.p: WEEK OF APRIL 8 VERSUS APRIL 1, 1997 DRILLING
MOVING RIGGING DRILLING DOWN TOTAL YR AGO
MOVING, RIGGING = CURRENTLY UNDER CONTRACT, BUT NOT AT FULL RATE. TOTAL LINE IS TOTAL WESTERN CANADA. FIGURES SUPPLIED BY CANADIAN ASSOCIATION OF OILWELL DRILLING CONTRACTORS.
